verbose_text: During infection of CD46+ mice, both CD46+ and CD46 +/RAG2-KO neonates upregulate RIGI mRNA (12.2-fold and 24.4-fold respectively, XREF_FIG A) in the brain, whereas infected CD46+ adults did not demonstrate significant upregulation of RIGI mRNA with infection (XREF_FIG B).
evidence: CD46+ and CD46+/RAG2-KO neonates upregulate RIGI mRNA
